main.name: Henok Ergana Selato
main.description: With a demonstrated history of working in the software development industry. Skilled in Java, Javascript, Node.js and HTML5. Strong engineering profession with a Master’s Degree in Computer Engineering focusing on Enterprise Systems from Università di Pisa.
main.bio: I’m a Software Developer based in Biella, Italy. I got my Bsc degree in 2009 from Admas University College by Information and Communication Technology (ICT). After that I worked at Lt Software engineering as a programmer and went to Information and Network Security Agency (INSA) and worked for three years and ten months as a software developer. Subsequently I start to work as an independent application developer and worked some apps and freelance works. Then I enrolled for the Master of Science in Computer Engineering at the university of Pisa and got my Msc degree from there. Currently I’m working as a software Developer at Amaris Consulting at their Torino Office Italy.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

work.title: Consulting Software Engineer
work.description: Working on Identity and Access Management System for Italian based bank. Using OpenAM which is access management, entitlements and federation server platform which is written in Java. On a daily basis i used OpenAM, Java, Shell Script, Tomcat Webserver, Oracle Database and SoapUI to develop, maintain and test the Identity and Access Management Platform of the organization.

work.title: Freelance Application Developer
work.description: I have been developing Software projects which both web and mobile applications for different client using tech stacks like Angular.js, node.js and mysql.

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: Requirement gathering and engineering, System analysis and design, User Interface design, Server side development, Database development,Deploying and unit testing, Preparing appropriate documentation, Prepare timely reports for the concerning body. At INSA the main tech stack used for developing the projects are Java Server Faces (JSF), Java persistence API (JPA) and Oracle Database managment system.

work.title: Programmer
work.description: My Main Task were System analysis and design, User Interface design, Server side development, Database development, Preparing appropriate documentation using Tech stacks like php, javascript and Mysql for database management system.

skills.name: Java
skills.description: Java was my first programming language that I started using in college years ago. It is by far the language I am most familiar with in terms of data-structure and algorithm programming.

skills.name: React Js
skills.description: I am fairly new to React and really did not like it at first. It has grown on me though and I will continue to use it going forward. I have built a ReactJS based resume-website template (link below in portfolio) which I used as a starting point for this personal site.

skills.name: Angular JS
skills.description: I enjoy MeteorJS for it's ease of configuration and its ability to get a full stack prototype up and running quickly. I used MeteorJS in a team for a Startup Programming class in UVIC in conjunction with React to build the MVP for Smirkspace (below in portfolio)

skills.name: Node JS
skills.description: Node JS is my server-side scripting language of choice. The bulk of my experience with it has been in conjunction with MeteorJS-based projects

skills.name: Bootstrap 4
skills.description: I use Bootstrap more often than not when designing the layout for my sites. It is the framework I am most familiar with and can therefore design more quickly than with others.

skills.name: Mysql
skills.description: I use Git for all of my projects so far. I have used Git for version control in small teams and have toyed around with contributing to Open Source Projects.

skills.name: Oracle
skills.description: I use Git for all of my projects so far. I have used Git for version control in small teams and have toyed around with contributing to Open Source Projects.

skills.name: MongoDB
skills.description: I have used many different database systems and am better educated and experienced with Relational Databases. However, for many applications, the ease of use of MongoDB better suits my needs and it is much more enjoyable to work with

skills.name: Tomcat
skills.description: I use Heroku as my hosting platform for most of my projects because so far they are all unpaid and their free tier is convenient. I also appreciate its integration with Github for such simple deployment.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
